result.name: BSD 2-Clause

result.value: The FAIR Data Registry is a Django website and REST API which is used by the FAIR Data Pipeline to store metadata about code runs and their inputs and outputs

The FAIR data registry is a component of the FAIR data pipeline that maintains a metadata catalogue for different data types utilised and generated within a typical epidemiological modelling workflow.

The *FAIR data registry* is a component of the [FAIR data pipeline](https://fairdatapipeline.github.io/) that maintains a metadata catalogue for different data types utilised and generated within a typical epidemiological modelling workflow.

The *FAIR data registry* is implemented as a [Django](https://www.djangoproject.com/) web application and REST API. The [FAIR data pipeline](https://fairdatapipeline.github.io) uses the data registry to store metadata about code runs and their inputs and outputs.

result.name: Release Version 1.0 with Schema Stable and RO Crate Integration
result.description:
## What's Changed
* Storage integration by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/14
* Bump djangorestframework from 3.11.0 to 3.11.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/16
* Bump django from 3.0.6 to 3.0.14 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/19
* Bump lxml from 4.5.1 to 4.6.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/18
* Local registry by @nathan-cummings-ukaea in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/26
* Bump lxml from 4.5.1 to 4.6.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/29
* Bump djangorestframework from 3.11.0 to 3.11.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/28
* Bump django from 3.0.6 to 3.0.14 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/27
* Add whitenoise to serve static files for local reg by @nathan-cummings-ukaea in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/35
* Bump django from 3.0.14 to 3.1.9 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/37
* Bump urllib3 from 1.25.9 to 1.26.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/31
* Schema changes by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/39
* Bump django from 3.1.9 to 3.1.12 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/42
* Changes to README to point to local/remote registry documentation by @agbeltran in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/50
* Add CLI command for creating a file containing a token by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/59
* Automatically generate access token when local registry is started by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/60
* Corrections due to recent schema changes by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/63
* Provide initial values for UUIDs by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/65
* Provide a Vagrantfile to run a local registry on a local VM. by @antony-wilson in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/57
* Allow PATCH requests for CodeRuns by @nathan-cummings-ukaea in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/67
* Change personal_name to given_names by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/69
* Adding UserAuthorOrg model by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/66
* Storage root and storage location changes by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/70
* Change CASCADE to PROTECT by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/78
* External object references data product not object by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/82
* Changes CodeRun description by @agbeltran in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/84
* Automatically create object component representing the whole object by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/83
* Display token create/revoke in modals by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/89
* Added correct status badge - closes #98 by @agbeltran in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/99
* Removal of organisations and changes to authors by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/100
* Identifiers in external object by @nathan-cummings-ukaea in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/92
* Replace other_unique_name with alternate_identifier and alternate_identifier_type by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/108
* Make version field mandatory for DataProduct model by @nathan-cummings-ukaea in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/114
* Add details pages for data products and external objects by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/120
* Reproducible UUIDs for Authors based on identifier by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/116
* Change `OneToOneField` relationship to `ForeignKey` in `DataProduct` by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/121
* Allow user to specify alternative port and install directory for registry launch by @kzscisoft in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/111
* Generate full URL of prov report in serializer by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/122
* Add windows batch scripts by @RyanJField in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/129
* Antony/prov rep by @antony-wilson in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/128
* Check for GraphViz before deciding on available renderers by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/133
* Display version on index page by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/132
* Remove duplicate authors from prov report #134 by @antony-wilson in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/135
* Add a citation file by @antony-wilson in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/138
* Code cov by @antony-wilson in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/137
* Allow users to define the aspect ratio of prov report images by @antony-wilson in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/139
* Update to README to include an improved description of the data regis… by @agbeltran in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/141
* Allow users to set the dpi of a prov report by @antony-wilson in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/144
* Add example data by @antony-wilson in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/142
* Add additional object to QualityControlled representing the quality control document by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/145
* Bump django from 3.1.12 to 3.1.13 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/148
* Json ld by @antony-wilson in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/147
* Enable download links for local registry by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/151
* Updating link to doc, and adding a bit more detail by @agbeltran in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/153
* Extending provenance report history by @antony-wilson in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/155
* Get provenance for all `ObjectComponent`s not just `whole_object`. by @nathan-cummings-ukaea in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/158
* Namespaces as global variables, fixed typo, added doc about json-ld by @agbeltran in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/160
* Add issues to data products in prov report and remove redundant function by @nathan-cummings-ukaea in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/159
* Update version of ubuntu used by Vagrant by @antony-wilson in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/163
* Update namespaces used in prov document by @antony-wilson in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/164
* Update the example data in line with Sonia's changes as of 8/10/21 by @antony-wilson in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/170
* Tidy up settings files by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/166
* Add API versioning using accept header by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/167
* Remove nose by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/176
* Use matrix in CI for python version by @kzscisoft in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/182
* Adding doi badge and updating citation file to latest release and doi by @agbeltran in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/179
* Ci fix by @RyanJField in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/183
* Ci fix by @RyanJField in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/184
* Ns fix by @RyanJField in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/188
* Find storage_root automatically based on current domain matching root by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/190
* Hotfix/update requirements by @bruvio in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/186
* Remove Port Restrictions by @RyanJField in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/191
* Add environment variable to allowed hosts by @RyanJField in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/193
* Merge main into branch by @RyanJField in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/194
* RO Crate by @antony-wilson in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/189
* use ro terms vocab for sha1 by @antony-wilson in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/197
* Update local-requirements.txt by @RyanJField in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/198
* Remote test registry by @RyanJField in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/199

## New Contributors
* @alahiff made their first contribution in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/14
* @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/16
* @nathan-cummings-ukaea made their first contribution in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/26
* @agbeltran made their first contribution in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/50
* @antony-wilson made their first contribution in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/57
* @kzscisoft made their first contribution in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/111
* @RyanJField made their first contribution in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/129
* @bruvio made their first contribution in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/186

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/compare/v0.1.1...v1.0

result.name: v1.0-rc9
result.description:
Added option to bind to a different address (e.g., 0.0.0.0).
Added PowerShell install and start/stop scripts.

## What's Changed
* Find storage_root automatically based on current domain matching root by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/190
* Hotfix/update requirements by @bruvio in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/186
* Remove Port Restrictions by @RyanJField in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/191

## New Contributors
* @bruvio made their first contribution in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/186

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/compare/v1.0-rc8...v1.0-rc9

result.name: v1.0-rc6

* Bump django from 3.0.14 to 3.1.9 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/37
* Bump urllib3 from 1.25.9 to 1.26.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/31
* Schema changes by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/39
* Bump django from 3.1.9 to 3.1.12 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/42
* Changes to README to point to local/remote registry documentation by @agbeltran in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/50
* Add CLI command for creating a file containing a token by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/59
* Automatically generate access token when local registry is started by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/60
* Corrections due to recent schema changes by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/63
* Provide initial values for UUIDs by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/65
* Provide a Vagrantfile to run a local registry on a local VM. by @antony-wilson in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/57

* Storage root and storage location changes by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/70
* Change CASCADE to PROTECT by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/78
* External object references data product not object by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/82
* Changes CodeRun description by @agbeltran in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/84
* Automatically create object component representing the whole object by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/83
* Display token create/revoke in modals by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/89
* Added correct status badge - closes #98 by @agbeltran in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/99
* Removal of organisations and changes to authors by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/100
* Identifiers in external object by @nathan-cummings-ukaea in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/92
* Replace other_unique_name with alternate_identifier and alternate_identifier_type by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/108
* Make version field mandatory for DataProduct model by @nathan-cummings-ukaea in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/114
* Add details pages for data products and external objects by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/120
* Reproducible UUIDs for Authors based on identifier by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/116
* Change `OneToOneField` relationship to `ForeignKey` in `DataProduct` by @alahiff in https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/pull/121

result.name: v1.0-rc4
result.description:
* Prov reports now from data products rather than code runs
* Windows batch scripts included
* Improvements to details pages for data products and external objects
* A single object can be associated with multiple data products
* UUID for authors is reproducible if identifier is specified

result.name: v1.0-rc3
result.description: In external objects `other_unique_name` has been replaced with `alternate_identifier` and `alternate_identifier_type`.

result.name: v1.0-rc2
result.description:
A number of schema changes relating to authors and organisations were made:
* `Organisation` removed
* `family_name` and `given_name` removed from `Author`, replaced by `name`
* in `Author`, at least one of `name` and `identifier` must be defined
* `Object` now has a writeable field `authors` for specifying a list of authors
* `ObjectAuthorOrg` has been removed
* `UserAuthorOrg` has been replaced by `UserAuthor`, and the optional organisations has been removed

Changes to `ExternalObject`:
* `doi_or_unique_name` has been replaced with `other_unique_name`
* an `identifier field` has been added. One of `other_unique_name` or `identifier` must be defined, but not both
* ( (`identifier` or `other_unique_name`), `title`, `version`) must be unique
* a read-only field `version` has been added, corresponding to the version of the associated `DataProduct`

Changes to `DataProduct`:
* `external_objects` has been replaced with `external_object`

result.name: v1.0-rc1
result.description: New release containing many schema changes.

result.name: Version 0.1.1
result.description: Added check_component script to code.

result.name: Version 0.1.0
result.description: Initial release of production code running at https://data.scrc.uk/

result.value:
abstract: "The FAIR data registry is a Django website and REST API which is used by the data-pipeline to store metadata about code runs and their inputs and outputs."

    given-names: Richard
  - family-names: Brett
    given-names: Alys
  - family-names: Cook
    given-names: James
  - family-names: Cummings
    given-names: Nathan

    given-names: Ryan
    orcid: "http://orcid.org/0000-0002-4424-9890"

    given-names: Alejandra

    given-names: Jonathan

    given-names: Kristian

message: "If you use this software, please cite it using these metadata."

title: "The FAIR Data Registry"
version: "v1.2.0"
doi: "10.5281/zenodo.5562750"
date-released: "2023-02-03"
result.title: The FAIR Data Registry

result.value:
Information on how to install and run a local FAIR data registry is available at [the local registry section in the project website](https://fairdatapipeline.github.io/docs/data_registry/). 

The [installation documentation](https://fairdatapipeline.github.io/docs/data_registry/) covers the scripts provided to install in different platforms, how to install a particular branch of the repository.

Installation, development and maintenance guides, especially for the remote registry, are available in the [Wiki](https://github.com/FAIRDataPipeline/data-registry/wiki). User documentation for the remote registry is also available [here](docs/index.md).

[travis-master-url]: https://travis-ci.com/ScottishCovidResponse/data-registry?branch=master

[travis-develop-img]: https://img.shields.io/travis/com/ScottishCovidResponse/data-registry/develop?label=build-develop
[travis-develop-url]: https://travis-ci.com/ScottishCovidResponse/data-registry?branch=develop
